column4: Hi all, i have a tv card "Multimedia video controller: Brooktree Corporation Bt878 Video Capture (rev 11)" , i can see all channels that i want, but i can't hear any audio, anyone can help me to understand how to configure the audio to come from the video card and go to my main audio card?
iirc, there's a separate audio-out jack on the back of the card that you can plug into the line-in of your sound card
there isn't what? an audio cord? an audio-out port? a line-in?
there is a connector, could be an RCA female connector
what about turning on the software mixer in volume control switches?
there are 2 cards: my audio card and the tv audio card
the tv card is seen also as audio card
right, so try turning the mix on for both and see what happens.
